title: Highest Fossil Fuel Energy Consumption
description: In 2022, Algeria's fossil fuel energy consumption was 100% of its total energy consumption, indicating complete reliance on fossil fuels.

title: Highest Total Reserves to External Debt Ratio
description: In 2023, Algeria's total reserves were 1110.24% of its total external debt, showcasing a strong reserve position relative to its debt.

title: Lowest Market Capitalization Relative to GDP
description: In 2018, the market capitalization of listed domestic companies in Algeria was only 0.19% of GDP, indicating a very small stock market relative to the size of the economy.

title: Lowest IBRD Loans and IDA Credits
description: In 2016, Algeria had only $725,000 in IBRD loans and IDA credits, reflecting minimal reliance on these international financial resources.

title: Lowest Public Debt Service to Exports Ratio
description: In 2023, Algeria's public and publicly guaranteed debt service was only 0.19% of its exports, indicating a low debt service burden relative to its export earnings.

title: Lowest Current Education Expenditure in Primary Education
description: In 2023, only 1.40% of total expenditure in primary public institutions in Algeria was current education expenditure, suggesting limited spending in this area.
